main.description: Hey there! Thank you for coming to my webpage! My name is Curtis and I am web developer and I also work for a start up company called Dubsado as a customer support specialist. Full stack software Devloper with a certifcate from the UCLA full stack web developer extension course.

work.title: Customer support specialist

experience.title: Internship
experience.description: Working in a group of 3 each of us were assigned a different task to complete for this scheduler application.

experience.title: Internship
experience.description: HTML, CSS, design and layout as well as basic Javascript functionality on a back end application for there customer rep team. Working in a team of 4 we were each tasked with building portions of this application. My contributions included design, structure and functionaility of 2 pages that required modals and email funtionality which I accomplished with the use of Javascript and an SMTP connection to Gmail. I was able to send emails to the admin using Javascript code.
